item.title: Why do I keep getting errors, when I add this to my server
item.dc:creator: @Lonely_Boy Lonely Boy
item.description:
@Lonely_Boy wrote:

Changed to:

case 9154: // Log out long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); inCombat(); { sendMessage("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; } //if(currentHealth > 0) logout(); break;

Got this error:

client.java:21707: unreachable statement logout(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Why do I keep getting errors, when I add this to my server
item.dc:creator: @Lonely_Boy Lonely Boy
item.description:
@Lonely_Boy wrote:

I changed it to:

case 9154: // Log out long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(inCombat()) { sendMessage("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; } //if(currentHealth > 0) logout(); break;

Then I got this error:

client.java:21702: incompatible types found : void required: boolean if(inCombat()) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Why do I keep getting errors, when I add this to my server
item.dc:creator: @Lonely_Boy Lonely Boy
item.description:
@Lonely_Boy wrote:

Hi, I want to add this to my server:

case 9154: // Log out long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (inCombat) { sendMessage("You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!"); break; } //if(currentHealth > 0) logout(); break;

Yes it is from dodian, but I get this error:

client.java:21702: cannot find symbol symbol : variable inCombat location: class client if (inCombat) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Does anyone no how to fix?

Many Thanks

Lonely Boy.

Yes, I’m new to coding.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do I keep getting errors, when I add this to my server
